Class HTMLOutline

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.io.html.HTMLOutline
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIConstants
public class HTMLOutline
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIConstants

The HTMLOutline Class generates a HTML Document.

writeBeginTags

private void writeBeginTags()
Write out the inital HTML tags for the current HTML file being created. This includes dynamically creating the style entries as per the users requirements.

writeEndTags

private void writeEndTags()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Write out the final closing HTML tags for the current HTML file being created.

Throws:
java.io.IOException, - if we are not zipping but trying to write the file out, and it fails.
java.io.IOException

print

public void print()
Process the export data and create the HTML output.

zipUpExport

private void zipUpExport(java.lang.String sFileName)
Zip up the export and its associated directories.

Parameters:
sFileName - the name of the zip file to export to.
